Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-size
CSS PROPERTY : width; height
DEFAULT      : 60px (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-angle
CSS PROPERTY : transform (rotate)
DEFAULT      : 0deg (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the rotation angle of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Rotation Angle

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : 2px currentColor solid (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : 50% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-timing
CSS PROPERTY : animation-duration
DEFAULT      : 1.7s (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the transition timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-translate-factor
CSS PROPERTY : top
DEFAULT      : 80% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the fading arrow's distance of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Translation Factor

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-content-size
CSS PROPERTY : width; height
DEFAULT      : 35% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the arrow content's size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Size (Content)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --arrow-content-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : 2px currentColor solid (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the arrow content's border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border (content)
